title: If you haven't given your mom a hug today....
body:
Then get the heck off of GD and go do it.  If you cannot physically see her, give her a call.  Not a text, a real phone call.  Let's be thankful today for the wonderful gift of our moms.  Moms are better than all the ranks, waifus, memes, and e$ports in the world.

Go out and thank a mom today
